Key Match Events: Vincent Aboubakar scored an early penalty kick conversion
Martin Hongla doubled the advantage for Cameroon in the 39th minute
Michael Olunga scored the solitary goal for Kenya in the 41st minute
Brian Mbeumo stretched Cameroon's lead two minutes later
Christian Bassogog hammered the final nail into Kenya's casket with a splendid goal in the 55th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cameroon's dominance over Kenya, stretching their wins to five in the nine encounters since 1972
Kenya has not won a single match against the West African nation
Kenya only had two shots on target, while Cameroon had five
The teams will flex their muscles in the second-leg fixture on Monday
Others: The encounter took place at the Japoma stadium in Douala
Cameroon is currently on top of Group J with seven points
Kenya now drops to third after matchday 3
The outcome leaves Cameroon needing only a draw in the return leg to secure qualification for the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations
The second-leg fixture will take place in Uganda
